RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRON N STEEL with the leaders out of the chute after breaking in good order, fell back to stalk that lead pack up the backstretch off the inside, advanced into a striking position four to five wide turning for home, wore down rival while drifting in. PARTY LITTLE BOY vied up front while three wide, showed the way into the stretch inside the winner in the four path, dueled past the furlong marker, gave ground grudgingly to that rival to the end while being floated in and brushed. EASY EDDIE A back off the pace outside, raced three wide through the turn, proved no match for the top two through the lane, well clear of the others. ASTROLOGY WONOWON broke alertly, narrowly showed the way out of the chute while between horses, continued to hold a narrow advantage between rivals into and through much of the turn then began to weaken when headed. MIDNIGHT CROWN with the pace along the inside, also weakened when the real running begin turning into the stretch. SAUCY ARGUMENT broke back, failed to menace while saving ground to no avail. LORD HELP ME last away, remained back throughout and was also not a factor. FOLLOWING A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF PARTY LITTLE BOY AGAINST IRON N STEEL FOR INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH, THE LATTER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST AND PLACED SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: with the pace inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Saucy Argument
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Help Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Astrology Wonowon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, narrowly set pace btwn foes, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Party Little Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front 3w, 4w into lane, dueled, floated in, stubbornly

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Iron N Steel
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside, 5w into lane, wore down foe, drifted in

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Eddie A
ENTRY.OWNER: Ardoin Farms LLC and Prejean Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 3w into lane, no match top two

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7 1/2F Turf CR: 85. Claiming Purse 17500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE JUNE 29, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000, if for $12,500, allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not C onsidered In Weight And Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENTERTAINMENT broke on top, got clear to show the way into the first turn, continued to set the pace while rating along the inside up the backstretch, remained clear through the final turn, drew way to increase advantage late under steady handling. STANDING MAN settled in the third flight off rail, rallied three wide through the lane to gain the place, no real threat to the winner. HOT LE ROY away with the winner, tracked that one along the inside, continued to pursue that one into the straight, no threat to that same foe as well, caught late for the second spot. AFLEET ASCENT in the second flight outside off the inside, had little left fore the second spot late. SMOKY TOPAZ went one paced throughout to also be found lacking in the late going. EAST LEX raced in mid pack and also failed to muster a closing response. STEALING APRIORITY four wide and well off the pace, also failed to rally. COLONIST remained back in failing to threaten. SPHEROID broke back and was never a factor. QUANA DUDE last to leave, trailed to be always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Entertainment
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, set pace inside, rated, drew away late

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Le Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked winner inside, caught 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Spheroid
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back and was not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Smoky Topaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout in lacking a closing kick.

ENTRY.NAME: Afleet Ascent
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, little left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Colonist
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to threaten

ENTRY.NAME: Standing Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: third flight off rail, 3w rally 2nd, no threat late to winner

ENTRY.NAME: Stealing Apriority
ENTRY.COMMENT: four wide, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: East Lex
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, lacked closing bid

ENTRY.NAME: Quana Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 29, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 29, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $ 12,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CATCAKE void of speed for a half, moved out a bit for the drive, rallied, finished up willingly between horses to be in time. SWEET VIDALIA off the pace while racing well out in the strip, came five wide for the drive, rallied while remaining widest and outside the winner, outkicked late. DEBBIES PASSAGE broke on top, dueled up front off the inside, shrugged off the other speed nearing the furlong marker to be clear, caught late while salvaging the show. SUMMERJUSTBET HER dueled up front closest to the inside for over four furlongs, first to blink in upper stretch. LA TRESS GRAY closest to the dueling leaders for a half, four wide exiting the turn, weakened through the stretch. BEYOND D'ORO was never a factor. FOUR PRINCESSES last away, more and more sluggish, pulled up out of the turn, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Four Princesses
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, sluggish,pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: La Tress Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased dueling leaders, 4w into lane, little left

ENTRY.NAME: Catcake
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, rallied stretch, up between foes

ENTRY.NAME: Summerjustbet Her
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, first to blink

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: was never a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Debbies Passage
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled outside, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Vidalia
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace well out in strip, 5w for drive, rallied, outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 11500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE JUNE 29, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 29, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WENDY WILECAT in mid pack while well wide early, advanced to a forward position four wide through the turn, challenged outside the leader when straightened for home, drove clear late. BIND ON EARTH set the pace off the inside, continued to hold the advantage in the two path exiting the turn, responded when the winner came alongside soon after, could not match strides with that one late, clearly second best. MARY JACK in the second flight early, moved toward the inside turn, saved ground into the lane, went evenly the final furlong to prove best of the others. LAURIEANN pressed the issue three wide, weakened through the stretch. SHE'S MY PRIORITY in tight at the start, in mid pack while off the inside, lacked a serious closing response. SASSY EMMA within striking distance well out in the strip, six wide turning for home, failed to muster a closing rally. STORM BREACH off a step slow, moved outside, also was six wide exiting the turn, went evenly through the lane. COUNTRY DREAM broke back, trailed early, improved five wide turn, flattened out through the stretch. TAPIT'S LADY broke out to tighten up a couple of outer rivals, made little other impact. MISS CHARLIE GRAS broke in slightly to help tighten up a pair of rivals, was straightened to race forward early, gave way in the turn. SUMMERTIME BANDIT in tight break, was finished early.

ENTRY.NAME: Country Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, trailed, 5w turn, improved bit

ENTRY.NAME: Tapit's Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, tightened up foes, little other impact

ENTRY.NAME: Summertime Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight break, finished early

ENTRY.NAME: She's My Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, mid pack off rail, lacked serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Charlie Gras
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in slightly, forward early, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Breach
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, moved out, 6w into lane, evenly stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Bind On Earth
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace off rail, no match, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Laurieann
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed the issue three wide, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Wendy Wilecat
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack well wide, 4w move turn, bid, drove clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Mary Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight,moved inside, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Emma
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance outside, 6w into lane, no rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Turf CR: 75. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOLLY'S GUITAR broke back, moved closer through the turn, just off the inside, dropped to the rail late in the bend, cut the corner into the lane to reach contention, took over inside the furlong marker, held the runner up at bay in a game effort. COPPER MOON behind the early leaders, chased the leader through the midway point on the turn, challenged on the outside into the lane, outgamed by the winner late. SHESABEAUTYDANCER broke alertly, showed the way up the backstretch along the inside, continued to hold the advantage into the stretch while off the rail, allowed the winner the inside with a furlong to run, weakened from between the top two, saved the show. BRAVE CITY GIRL in the main body into the turn along the inside, moved off the rail late in the turn, displayed some mild late interest. CAJUN GUMBOW chased the leader off the inside, came five wide out of the turn and weakened in the run to the wire. HEY MADALYN CLAIRE main group, shuffled back late backstretch, passed tiring rivals while not a threat. JANISTHEBEAUTY in mid pack early, fell back before three furlongs, not a threat stretch. APRIORITY MAGIC last to leave, raced back, improved a bit into the lane, flattened out. MYDEALOFTHEDAY was finished after three furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Brave City Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: in main body inside, mild interest late

ENTRY.NAME: Shesabeautydancer
ENTRY.OWNER: Deckert Mark and Terre Dawn W
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, pace inside, weakened btwn foes stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Madalyn Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Gumbow
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 5w into lane, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Dolly's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, closer turn, dropped inside, cut corner, game late

ENTRY.NAME: Apriority Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, improved, flattened out final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Mydealoftheday
ENTRY.OWNER: Faulk Nathaniel J and Cormier Jr Clifton J
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished after three furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Janisthebeauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack early, fell back

ENTRY.NAME: Copper Moon
ENTRY.OWNER: Stumpf Donna and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind early pace, chased turn, outside bid, outgamed late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TSURIS unhurried in the early going while three wide through the first turn, four wide backstretch, continued in the four path when beginning to advance second turn, roused when straightened for home, quickly reeled in the pacesetter to win going away. JANET'S DEVIL broke on top, cleared toward the inside early in the first turn, enjoyed a long lead the middle half, continued to hold a significant advantage with a furlong to run, proved no match for the winner late, remained clear of the others. MICHAEL'S BAD BOY lacked early foot, moved closer before a half, chased the runner up through the final turn and upper stretch, could do little with that one late while also proving not a match for the winner, saved the show. TALK TO TOKEY four wide through the first turn, raced in the second flight, lacked a serious closing response. MAGAZINE STREET void of speed, improved position without posing a serious threat. GRAHAM 'S CRUISER broke with the lead group despite stumbling, settled in mid pack early, had little for the drive. MR ELVIN also had little for the stretch run. XIETELEHUAS last away, remained always back. STONE ALLIANCE chased early, stopped after a half, distanced after losing contact with the field, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Stone Alliance
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, stopped, distanced, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Graham 's Cruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, mid pack, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Magazine Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, improved, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Michael's Bad Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, closer after half, chased, lasted show

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Elvin
ENTRY.COMMENT: little left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Xietelehuas
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Talk to Tokey
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, second flight, lacked serious punch

ENTRY.NAME: Tsuris
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried 3w, 4w backstretch, reeled in leader, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Janet's Devil
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, cleared, long lead, no match late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 71. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CZAR'S BALLERINA unhurried early toward the inside, moved closer under her own courage after a half, continued to be patiently handled through the second bend, steered out when straightened for home, outside bid, kicked clear under steady handling. FOLLOW THE SAINT broke in good order, pressured the leader in the two path, bid turning into the lane, proved no match for the winner the final furlong, finished well clear for the place. MADISON'S SCREEN broke on top, set the pace inside, headed into the lane by the runner up, weakened but managed to save the show. LOVERS NEVER SAY second flight early, fell back to trail, continued to lag into the lane, some belated interest to be gaining for the show, no threat to the top pair. K V SQUARED settled off the pace and the inside, lacked a response when called on for the drive. SKY HIGH SUSAN broke out and steadied be last away, raced outside early while a bit keen, had nothing for the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Lovers Never Say
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, gaining show late

ENTRY.NAME: Madison's Screen
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Follow the Saint
ENTRY.OWNER: Thornton Joe and Cascio Andrew J
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed leader 2p, no match winner final furlong, solid 2nmd

ENTRY.NAME: Sky High Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, steadied, bit keen, nothing for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Czar's Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried inside, closer after half, patient 2nd, steered out,bid

ENTRY.NAME: K V Squared
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, lacked response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOLLOW THROUGH broke alertly, soon clear, set all the pace, drew out through the lane while being kept to task. SUM CHARM bothered at the start, quickly recovered to race closest to the winner, continued to chase that one into the stretch, proved no match for that one in the drive, remained clear for the place. GRACE'S SOLDIER raced within striking distance off the inside, lacked a closing punch, narrowly gained the nod for the show. MS. PRIESTLY lacked speed, five wide into the lane, improved position with some late interest, missed the show. TERRI GOT A FRIEND broke in at the break to bother inner rivals, raced in mid pack off the inside, dropped to the rail entering the stretch, finished up evenly. ABBY DABBY settled off the pace inside, saved ground to no avail through the turn in lacking a closing response. KASENS TRIBE void of speed, was four wide out of the turn, improved position a bit while never a serious threat. CHARMING KAT within striking distance for a half off the inside, backed up through the lane. NIKLAUSIA bore out at the break to bother a couple of outer rivals, four wide out of the turn, failed to rally. SPARKLE CITY bothered at the break, in some traffic into the turn, remained back. SHOTGUN ANNIE bothered at the break but broke with the leaders, quickly fell back, failed to menace. SHE'S THE SHERIFF bothered at the start, moved up to race in mid pack, began a steady retreat just before a half. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE START, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Priestly
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 5w into lane, improved, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Abby Dabby
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, saved ground to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Sparkle City
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered break, traffic into turn, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: She's the Sheriff
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered break, moved up to mid pack, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Terri Got a Friend
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in break to bother inner rivals, mid pack, dropped inside

ENTRY.NAME: Follow Through
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set all the pace,drew out stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Grace's Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, nod show

ENTRY.NAME: Kasens Tribe
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 4w into lane, improved a bit

ENTRY.NAME: Niklausia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out break, straightened, 4w 1/4, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Sum Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: bother brk, closest to winner, no match, remained clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Shotgun Annie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bothered break, fell back, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Charming Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed outside, faded stretch
